name: Redneck Rampage
description: Well, we crash-landed that UFO in the desert and Bubba says he wants to go home. Heck, I don't blame him 'cause there ain't no place like Hickston. But according to my map, we're gonna have to blast our way through jack o' lope farms and a riverboat as well as a brothel 'fore we get home again.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10) Processor: 1 GHz Processor (1.4 GHz recommended) Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended) Storage: 592 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
